name: Peepo Hop!
description:
Peepo Hop! is a precision platformer that will test your challenge your skills. Play as Peepo to reclaim his treasure perched at the top but be careful one wrong hop can send Peepo falling back down.



Master the Art of Precision: Take control of the unique jumping mechanic, where you charge Peepo's left and right leg independently. Combine the strength of each leg to change the trajectory of your jump.



Race to the Top: Finish your ascent and your time will be recorded on the leaderboard. Contribute your time to a group on the leaderboard where the average time of your group is ranked amongst other groups.



Peepo needs your help to reclaim his treasure. Mind your hops and aim for the top. Try not to fall too many times. Good luck!
